captions.text:
I'm Brooklyn, from
Brooklyn and Bailey,

and today I'm going
to be showing you

how I apply my mascara
in the morning.

A lot of you guys have
asked for a video of this,
so I hope you like it.

The first thing I
do in the morning
is I crimp my eyelashes.

Lots of people like to heat
it up with their blow dryers
and crimp them.

I don't know, I just
don't like doing that.

So I'll show you how
I crimp my lashes.

You put them in there, and you
squeeze them for five seconds.

You hold it one, two,
three, four, five.

And then I'll let go,
and raise your eyebrows.

And then I'll move it
down a little bit further

down my eyelashes, and then I'll
just curl it under like this,
and then let go.

And you can see it
curls it better.

So now you're just
going to repeat that.

So I'll squeeze one,
two, three, four, five.

And curl it under,
and there you go.

And lots of makeup artists,
their trick to using mascara
is they always apply two layers.
And so this is my first layer.

It's Almay One-Coat
Nourishing Mascara.

It's to thicken, make your
eyelashes look darker.

So this is the first
coat that I use.

And lots of people
like to go like this
and rub underneath and go up.
I just like to blink on mine.

And so, I'll bring
it up like that.
And then, do it down here, too.
Just brush it.
And same over here, brush it up.

And then, down
here, brush it down.

And then, my second coat is
Physician's Formula Organic

Wear, and it looks like this,
it's like a little leaf.

And it's my top coat, and I
like to use this one because you

can see the brush, it separates
all the little eyelashes.

So I just do the same thing,
I'll just blink on it,
push my eyelashes up.

Make them spread
out, nice and pretty.

I'm going to do it to
the bottom as well.

Sometimes if you
get a smear, you

can use some water or some
makeup remover and a Q-tip

and, you know, wipe it
underneath your eyes and on top
to get it to go away.

But this is how I apply
my mascara in the morning.

Be sure to follow
me on Instagram,

@BrooklynAndBailey,
and comment below

and tell me if you
like this video,
and we will see you later.

title: Mascara for Beginners | Brooklyn and Bailey

I NEED to get this straight. If a 10 year old wants to cake her face in 
makeup THAT IS FINE. If an 18 year old wants to wear no makeup THAT IS 
FINE. It's their choice and is not your concern. If you're going to judge a 
person on the makeup they wear then why? You shouldn't judge anyone for the 
colour of their skin so why judge someone for the way they present 
themselves. Makeup is to help self esteem. If feel more confiident wearing 
makeup then go for it girl! High fives to you.﻿

comments.text:
Can someone help me? I'm 11 turning 12 in a few months and I want to start 
wearing a little bit of mascara. My friend gave me one of her mascaras as a 
present and I only used it once, at school just to try. I want to wear 
mascara every day without hiding but I don't know how to ask my mom if I 
can! How should I just open up to her and ask? Will she think I'm too 
young? Because half the girls in my class wear mascara and I want to start 
too! Please help!﻿
comments.author: Adriana Arteaga

comments.text: Just ask ur mom that u wanna wear make up

comments.author: Adriana Arteaga

comments.text:
+Maggy Hovden Also mention to her that your friend gave you some to try out 
but you didn't want to without her permission. It will definitely get you 
on her good side for not going behind her back and doing it ( granted 
you've tried it once, but that's not the point. You probably didnt get the 
full effect because you were trying to hide it )
comments.author: Hannah Estes

comments.text:
Just ask her, "Hey mom, I was wondering if I could start wearing mascara 
since I'm almost 12. A lot of my friends started to wear mascara and I'd 
like to experiment with it." If she says no, it's probably because she 
doesn't think you're ready or old enough. Don't worry about it, I didn't 
start wearing any makeup until I was 13! You're beautiful without makeup(: 
also, try to ask her when she's in a good mood. Lol that always helps! Good 
luck!❤️
comments.author: Maggy Hovden

comments.text:
I'm 10 years old and i wear makeup sometimes for fun sometimes for town and 
practice mostly FUN town and practice! My mom said i cant where it to 
school YET! And to watch videos on YouTube on mascara for beginners and I 
was watching Get Ready With Me from Brooklyn & Bailey and Brooklyn said she 
had a video called Mascara for Beginners so I thought ok later i ABSOLUTELY 
NEED to watch this video of Brooklyn's! And it's really helpful! And here 
is something else i need to say eye curlers are DANGEROUS! So says me and 
my mom! Cause my mom said i need to make the mascara curl my eye lashes and 
I asked if i could use a curler she said you can rip all of your eye lashes 
off with it and I said how do you know? And she said because I have done it 
before! LOL OMLL (oh my lordy lord!) well anyway im in the 4{grade} and I 
wear makeup and when I do i like to act very prissy and sassy with class 
and i enjoy it! And plz NO hate if you DONT agree with this comment just 
simply like or ignore plz plz plz NO hate this is MY ol' itty bitty opinion 
my opinion doesn't matter yours does so ignore mine and do YOUR buisness! 
And remember NO hate!



XOXO

~Brooklyn Ramey {10}

﻿
